  physical_appearance: This is a painted fabric template. It consists of four panels arranged in a horizontal row. Within each panel
 there is an image of a bird surrounded by floral patterns. The coloured birds are drawn in a variety of positions with different uncoloured background motifs. The cloth is slightly stained.

  subject_terms_1: textile art (visual works) birds (motifs) flower (motif) patterns (design elements)

  subject_terms_2: Motifs Textile design Textile crafts

  subject_terms_3: Vanishing trade Textile art and design

  sgcool_label_text: Fabric templates were used to guide the embroiderer. Drawn in a lively manner
 each bird is surrounded by a dense square of ferns and flowers. These creatures are fantastical inventions
 with peacock feathers for tails and bodies that are painted blue
 green and yellow.\r\n\r\nAs pre-prepared template patterns were typically repetitive and conventional
 this example stands out for the variety of animated postures and flora depicted. Pre-prepared patterns could be purchased and were popular because they could be used with beads
 silk floss or a combination of different materials.\r\n

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a painted fabric template. It consists of four panels arranged in a horizontal row. Within each panel, there is an image of a bird surrounded by floral patterns. The coloured birds are drawn in a variety of positions with different uncoloured background motifs. The cloth is slightly stained.
metadata.subject_terms_1: textile art (visual works) birds (motifs) flower (motif) patterns (design elements)
metadata.subject_terms_3: Vanishing trade Textile art and design
metadata.sgcool_label_text:
Fabric templates were used to guide the embroiderer. Drawn in a lively manner, each bird is surrounded by a dense square of ferns and flowers. These creatures are fantastical inventions, with peacock feathers for tails and bodies that are painted blue, green and yellow.

As pre-prepared template patterns were typically repetitive and conventional, this example stands out for the variety of animated postures and flora depicted. Pre-prepared patterns could be purchased and were popular because they could be used with beads, silk floss or a combination of different materials.
